product_overview: ShamanTek is an interactive digital portal exploring the convergence of technology, spirituality, and art through a visually-driven, mystical, cyberpunk-themed content platform. It serves as a static website showcasing philosophical, spiritual, and artistic worlds through rich multimedia experiences and interactive elements.
core_goals: Create an engaging, aesthetic landing portal introducing three thematic worlds: IA & Futuro, Espiritualidad, and Arte Surrealista.
Provide immersive, thematic hubs for exploring articles and multimedia content in each world.
Enable intuitive navigation with interactive UI elements like animated cards, progress bars, and hover effects.
Support an exploratory user journey through content discovery, interactive art experiences, and newsletter subscription.
Maintain high performance, accessibility, and responsive design across devices.
key_features: Landing page with animated tunnel reveal, interactive subtitle scramble, bento grid navigation, starfield background, spotlight cursor effect, CRT scanlines overlay, and 3D card tilting.
Newsletter subscription form with email validation and magnetic submit button.
Three thematic 'world' hubs each with distinct visual themes and curated articles or galleries:
- IA & Futuro: Terminal cyberpunk visuals, status indicators, article cards with metadata and tags.
- Espiritualidad: Mystical gold accents, glowing orbs, rotating mantra messages.
- Arte Surrealista: Surrealistic pink accents, particle effects, interactive art galleries including a maze game.
Interactive article pages with world-themed backgrounds, scroll progress bar, content navigation sidebar, blockquotes, related article links, and thematic footer mantras.
Laberinto Onírico interactive maze with 5 hidden easter egg nodes, progress tracking, and completion messaging.
Consistent design system including color palette, typography, and animation timing specifications.
Browser support for modern major browsers and responsive layouts optimized for mobile to large desktop screens.
user_flow_summary: User lands on portal landing page, experiences animation effects, and navigates through world cards to select a thematic world.
In a world hub, user browses article cards and selects an article to read, using scroll progress and navigation features.
User explores related articles or returns to world hub or portal landing.
User ventures into the Arte Surrealista world to access the Laberinto Onírico gallery, interacting with the maze nodes and completing the experience.
User submits email address via newsletter subscription form and receives confirmation alert.
validation_criteria: Landing page animations including tunnel reveal, text scramble, spotlight cursor, and card tilt operate smoothly and without glitches.
All three worlds' hubs are accessible from the portal and world transitions perform visual zoom effect.
Articles load correctly with metadata, tags, and navigation components functioning as expected.
Newsletter subscription validates email format and displays confirmation alert upon submit.
Interactive elements including hover effects, hamburger menu, particle effects, and labyrinth nodes respond correctly.
Site renders consistently across supported browsers (Chrome 90+, Firefox 88+, Safari 14+, Edge 90+) and responsive breakpoints (375px, 768px, 1024px, 1440px).
Accessibility standards per WCAG 2.1 AA are met with keyboard navigation support and reduced motion preference respected.
Performance targets are met: First Contentful Paint under 1.5 seconds, Time to Interactive under 3 seconds, Lighthouse performance score above 85.
Known limitations such as newsletter backend integration and limited art galleries acknowledged for future roadmap implementation.
